inclusion.criterion: concomitant illnesses except treated hypothyroidism will be recruited and also have an HbA1C
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Menstruating women must have a negative pregnancy test.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Lactating and pregnant women will be excluded
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Anemia defined by Hemoglobin of less than 12 gm/dl
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: History of substance abuse (evaluated by medical history and CRAFFT questionnaire)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: On any other medication which affects blood sugars
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Having any other chronic condition except hypothyroidism stable on medications
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: On chronic medications that may affect glucose excursions
exclusion.label: triggers
